Wever’s concierges offer you 100% IRL date.
All you need is a good profile.

  • WEVER PROMISE

    We guarantee your IRL date, 100%

    We provide what other dating apps will not: a guaranteed IRL date with a quality member. Instead of focus on swipe-to-pay like others, wever focuses on 100% actual meetup.
    Wever only charges you if you have a date IRL.
    If your match flakes on you, we guarantee 100% money back.

    Learn more
  • WEVER VERIFICATION

    We verify everyone with real documents

    We know your concerns when using a dating app, like the risk of encountering a scammer or someone who isn't what they claim to be.
    Despite having these risks, almost all the dating apps still skip the verification process.
    Wever has a strict identification process that involves a photo ID, business card, and real documents for income that may prove what you wrote on your profile is 100% valid.

    Learn more
  • WEVER CONCIERGE

    Just focus on your date Concierge will plan the rest

    Arranging your first date is always the hardest thing.
    Studies show that over 83% of total matches in most dating apps couldn't get to the actual date, either due to ghosting or the last minute cancelation.
    In order to fundamentally solve this problem, Wever's concierges guarantee you 100% IRL dates. Just focus on your date and we'll plan the rest for you.

    Learn more
  • WEVER CARE

    Chance of meeting a bad apple is almost 0%

    Dating service without a professional concierge, like in any conventional dating app, puts you in the risk of encountering bad apples.
    Using Wever, you'll no longer have to worry about any of these.
    All you have to do is just follow our concierge.
    After the meeting make sure to leave post-meeting feedback. Anyone who shows bad manners here will be kicked out immediately.We prioritize integrity and safety of our community.

    Learn more

How it works

  • STEP 1. Register you profile

    Register your profile and request invitation.

  • STEP 2. Confirm Yes or No

    Once we send you a profile of your potential date,
    you decide whether to meet the person or not.

  • STEP 3. Date Scheduling

    Wever's concierge will arrange the date for two of you.

  • STEP 4. Feedback

    Leave your feedbacks after your date night.
